item.title: Software Sales and Sales Leads (Microsoft-based) (campbell)
item.description:
Software Sales and Sales Leads (Microsoft-based - SharePoint, Silverlight, .NET, etc.) Part-time and Full-time
We are a Microsoft Partner that is expanding our presence in the Microsoft-based market and looking for help from experienced sales professionals with substantial success selling Microsoft-based solutions. We have part-time and full-time positions available.

Part-time: We are paying finders fees (2%) for sales leads that convert to sales.
Full-time: We are paying commissions (15%) for sales professionals that manage the complete sales process from lead gen to close.

The Sales Executive will be responsible for generating and following up on business leads, interacting with key decision makers at targeted companies and channel partners.

The Solution Sales Executive will also have the following additional responsibilities:
-Actively managing all aspects of the sales cycle and be responsible to turn leads into sales.
-Produce sales to meet or exceed the assigned sales volume objective.
-Effectively present/deliver value proposition and solution overview.
-Territory: Continental US

This position requires the following experience and skills:
-Minimum 2 years of Microsoft centric solution or consulting service selling experience
-Must be a self-starter and comfortable to be self-sufficient.
-A minimum of 2 years related software development and/or consulting delivery experience to prospects or through channels.
-A proven ability in developing relationships with key decision makers and influencers.
-Excellent communication and presentation skills over the phone or in person.
-Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
-Local Candidates Preferred.
 Compensation: Finder fees and Commissions
 Principals only. Recruiters, please don't contact this job poster.
 Please, no phone calls about this job!
 Please do not contact job poster about other services, products or commercial interests.
